medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain since arrival to the ED.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain was lower abdominal, sharp, and slightly worse on the right side compared to the left. New back pain started since arriving to the ED. The pain was not associated with nausea, vomiting, or changes in bowel habits. There was no urinary frequency or urgency.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of C-diff after Clindamycin, treated with oral antibiotics years ago. No past surgical history.
